comments.body: I've added document about manual procedure for testing if the provider/backport packges are importable. That saves a lot of time for testing of those scripts because you can initialize the whole container with all the deps once and tests the scripts inside.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +172,176 @@
* You can install the .whl packages with `pip install <PACKAGE_FILE>`


# Testing provider package scripts
